comments.content:
This Tibet thing doesn't look so hot right now, so maybe if you want to test the waters of an alternate path, we could spend two weeks in August getting together and hacking project ideas together (ideally NOT at your parent's place). Maybe just a cheap rental cottage with Internet access.. those exist in Holland, right?) If not, a Hostel or whatever might also fit the bill. Anyhow, I'd love to see what could be accomplished in such a short time, but also what it actually feels like to be in that mind and mode.

Send me an email if you're interested!
